QuestData.Title: Totem Modification
QuestData.Description: Okay, I'll let you in on the real work, since you're looking at me so desperately.$B$BThis rock is untapped! It's probably richer than a trade prince during a great war! I need samples. More samples. Samples from everywhere!$B$BI've modified my earth totems to drill through the sand and store samples of the rock underneath. Go find a nice spot and plant one.$B$BThe shaking and rumbling will probably attract all the cute, curious wildlife, so maybe you can make some friends while you're at it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant one of Sambino's modified totems in the sand of Silver Tide Trench.
QuestData.RewardText: Another sample. Brilliant! The rocky riches of the sea shall soon be mine!
